00099 class EGS_PARALLEL_BEAM_EXPORT EGS_ParallelBeam :
00100           public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00109     EGS_ParallelBeam(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, EGS_BaseShape *Shape,
00110             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00111             EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), shape(Shape), uo(0,0,1) {
00112             setUp(); };
00113 
00118     EGS_ParallelBeam(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00119     ~EGS_ParallelBeam() {
00120         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00121     };
00122 
00123     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00124             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00125         x = shape->getRandomPoint(rndm); u = uo; wt = 1;
00126     };
00127 
00128     EGS_Float getFluence() const { return count/shape->area(); };
00129 
00130     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const { return true; };
00131 
00132     bool setFluenceState(istream &) { return true; };
00133 
00134     bool isValid() const { return (s != 0 && shape != 0); };
00135 
00136 protected:
00137

00139     EGS_Vector    uo;
